TourCompanies.name: On The Go Tours
TourCompanies.description: Award-winning Egypt tours including Nile cruises and pyramid visits with expert local guides.

TourCompanies.name: Intrepid Travel

TourCompanies.name: Insight Vacations
TourCompanies.description: Premium guided journeys exploring Egypt's wonders in comfort and style.

TourCompanies.name: G Adventures
TourCompanies.description: Adventurous and budget-friendly Egypt trips led by knowledgeable guides.

TourCompanies.name: Travco Group
TourCompanies.description: One of Egypt’s largest travel groups offering everything from beach holidays to cultural tours.

TourCompanies.name: Memphis Tours
TourCompanies.description: Tailored trips to Egypt including desert safaris, cruises, and family adventures.

TourCompanies.name: Abercrombie & Kent
TourCompanies.description: Luxury Egypt travel packages with private tours and exclusive access.

TourCompanies.name: Odynovo Tours
TourCompanies.description: Custom private tours across Egypt from the pyramids to the Red Sea.

TourCompanies.name: Look at Egypt Tours
TourCompanies.description: Local travel company offering multi-day guided tours across Egypt’s top sites.

TourCompanies.name: Beyond the Nile Tours
TourCompanies.description: Custom tours focused on authentic experiences and personal service.

TourCompanies.name: True Egypt
TourCompanies.description: Experts in cultural and historical tours across Egypt with local insights.

TourCompanies.name: Classic Egypt Tours
TourCompanies.description: Offering classic sightseeing packages to the pyramids, temples, and tombs.

TourCompanies.name: Travel Talk Tours
TourCompanies.description: Affordable group tours for young travelers interested in adventure and culture.

TourCompanies.name: Urban Adventures Egypt
TourCompanies.description: Day tours in Cairo and beyond focusing on food, culture, and local life.

TourCompanies.name: Classic Holidays Egypt
TourCompanies.description: Trusted Egypt tour company offering customizable holiday packages.

Tours.name: Pyramids & Great Sphinx Half‑Day Tour with Camel Ride
Tours.Description: Visit the Pyramids of Giza and the Great Sphinx, enjoy a camel ride at sunrise with a licensed Egyptologist guide.

Tours.name: Cairo Museum, Citadel & Old Cairo Walking Tour
Tours.Description: Explore the Egyptian Museum, the Citadel of Saladin, and historic Old Cairo including Khan El Khalili.

Tours.name: Giza Sunrise Pyramid Camel or Horse Ride & Breakfast
Tours.Description: Sunrise at the pyramids, camel or horse ride around the plateau, followed by local breakfast and panoramic views.

Tours.name: 4‑Day Nile Cruise from Luxor to Aswan
Tours.Description: Cruise the Nile visiting Luxor, Kom Ombo, Edfu, Philae Island; includes meals, guided temples visits.

Tours.name: Memphis, Sakkara & Dahshur Pyramids Day Tour
Tours.Description: See the Step Pyramid at Sakkara, the Bent & Red pyramids of Dahshur, and the ancient capital Memphis.

Tours.name: Private Luxor Day Tour by Flight from Cairo
Tours.Description: Fly to Luxor, visit Karnak Temple, Valley of the Kings, Hatshepsut Temple, return by evening.

Tours.name: Giza Quad Bike Desert Safari Near Pyramids
Tours.Description: Thrilling quad bike adventure across the desert near the Giza plateau, with optional camel ride.

Tours.name: Full‑Day Bahariya Oasis Desert Safari from Cairo
Tours.Description: Includes 4×4 across White Desert, Magic Crystal Mountain, with Bedouin Lunch and hot springs dip.

Tours.name: Nile Sunset Dinner Cruise in Cairo
Tours.Description: Dinner cruise on the Nile with live music, belly dance show, and illuminated Cairo skyline views.

Tours.name: Full‑Day Alexandria & Library of Alexandria Tour
Tours.Description: Visit Qaitbay Citadel, Catacombs of Kom el Shoqafa, Montazah Palace, and the Bibliotheca Alexandrina.

Tours.name: Sound & Light Show at Giza Pyramids
Tours.Description: Evening spectacular of lights and narration projected onto the Pyramids of Giza under the stars.

Tours.name: Private Train to Luxor & Valley of the Kings Tour
Tours.Description: Overnight sleeper train from Cairo to Luxor, followed by guided visit to the Valley of the Kings.

Tours.name: Hot Air Balloon Flight over Luxor Temples
Tours.Description: Experience sunrise from a hot air balloon floating over the Valley of the Kings and Nile Valley.

Tours.name: St. Catherine Monastery & Mount Sinai Day Trek
Tours.Description: Full‑day guided journey to St. Catherine’s Monastery and ascent of Mount Sinai for panoramic views.

Tours.name: Sharm El‑Sheikh Snorkeling & Desert Experience
Tours.Description: Morning snorkeling at Ras Mohamed National Park, followed by ATV desert safari and BBQ lunch.
